message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $950,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This is my best offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise.
I understand Alice, but given my financial situation, I am unable to meet your asking price. I would like to make one last counteroffer of $1,000,000.
